title: Vayne's tumble and Caitlyn's head shots stack with crit, but shaco's backstab can't?
body:
Gee, I wonder why AD Shaco is dead

Edit: I feel like Shaco is becoming a skirmisher. He is good at 1v1s, makes good picks, not as much burst, boxes have CD before they activate, etc.

I guess what he's trying to say is that critting completely negates the bonus damage from Backstab. If Vayne with Q crits, the Q bonus damage does not dissapear; it still gets dealt. Same with Caitlyn; a headshot crit will not deal just her regular crit damage, but also the ability's own damage. 
And one of the main arguments is that those two can do it from relative safety without having to blow their only escape and bothering to flank an enemy. Mind you, a single critical Headshot from Caitlyn, with her first two items being IE and Hurricane has more AD scaling packed in than Shaco's entire kit.

And there's a reason why Shaco can not just build like other AD assassins; he has no scalings to do so. For example, Talon and Zed both have multiple abilities that scale well with AD as well as ultimates which are powerful burst tools. Shaco has only one reliable AD scaling spell in his kit, meaning that the bulk of his damage has to come from autoattacks.
